review_title: It’s Nice but could be Nicer
job_title: Call Center Representative in Chicago, IL
pros: You get a sense of the real world and helping others in need, can actually build your customer service skills, learn how to cope with others and solve problems
cons: You don’t get paid enough for the work you do, yes you get treated pretty decent but you do not get the recognition for your work, it’s very minimum and a lot of favoritism

pros: Great mission driven organization that helps the community it serves.
Alivio’s mission- we take pride in taking care of those in need
cons: Administration is out of touch with its employees. Pay is not worth all the drama and issues
